video.title: Courage the Cowardly Dog
video.synopsis: Courage the Cowardly Dog lives on a farm in a town called Nowhere, where he defends owners Muriel and Eustace from monsters and other creepy critters.

episodes.synopsis: Muriel, Eustace and Courage check into a motel run by a sinister cat named Katz. / Courage must save Muriel from ending up in a pot of stew.
episodes.title: Night at the Katz Mote / Cajun Granny Stew

episodes.synopsis: An evil shadow descends on the farm, terrorizing our happy threesome. / When Muriel is struck on the head, she comes down with amnesia.
episodes.title: The Shadow of Courage / Dr. Le Quack, Amnesia Specialist

episodes.synopsis: Courage is terrified when Bigfoot turns up at the farm. / The farmer goes to a hair institute that promises hair growth, dragging Courage with him.
episodes.title: Courage Meets Bigfoot / Hothead

episodes.synopsis: Muriel becomes possessed by a demon in her mattress. / Muriel's nephew Fred -- a deranged barber -- comes for a visit.
episodes.title: The Demon in the Mattress / Freaky Fred

episodes.synopsis: Muriel is bitten by a weremole. / The farmer visits his mother on Mother's Day, taking a reluctant Courage along with him.
episodes.title: Night of the Weremole / Mother's Day

episodes.synopsis: Duck brothers from outer space kidnap Muriel. / Courage finds a mysterious locked box that belonged to the farmer's deceased brother.
episodes.title: The Duck Brothers / Shirley the Medium

episodes.synopsis: Courage finds a cursed ancient artifact buried outside the house. / A fungus swallows up the farmer's entire body.
episodes.title: King Ramses' Curse / The Clutching Foot

episodes.synopsis: Much to the farmer's disgust, Courage befriends a hunchback. / A lonely goose god looks down from the heavens and decides Muriel must be his queen.
episodes.title: The Hunchback of Nowhere / The Gods Must Be Goosey

episodes.synopsis: A puddle queen woos the farmer and drags him down to her puddle world. / A famous film director decides he wants to shoot his next film at the farm.
episodes.title: Queen of the Black Puddle / Everyone Wants to Direct

episodes.synopsis: An evil snowman tries to steal Muriel, the farmer and Courage's "anti-melting" genes. / A little duckling plots to get rid of Muriel and Courage.
episodes.title: The Snowman Cometh / The Precious, Wonderful, Adorable, Loveable Duckling

episodes.synopsis: Courage suspects evildoings at a diner that serves strange-looking burgers. / Muriel, Courage and the farmer end up on a deserted island.
episodes.title: Heads of Beef / Klub Katz

episodes.synopsis: The chicken from outer space returns to seek revenge on Courage. / Muriel prepares to cook vegetables, but eggplants from her garden have other plans.
episodes.title: The Revenge of the Chicken from Outer Space / Journey to the Center of Nowhere

episodes.synopsis: A tornado destroys the farmhouse and turns Muriel into a little girl again. / A traveling stage, manned by an evil stage master, turns up at the farm.
episodes.title: Little Muriel / The Great Fusilli

episodes.synopsis: Muriel receives some seeds, which grow into a magic tree that makes wishes come true. / Courage defends Earth from a misunderstood alien.
episodes.title: The Magic Tree of Nowhere / Robot Randy

episodes.synopsis: Shirley puts a curse on the farmer that can only be undone when he learns generosity. / A giant cockroach takes the family hostage.
episodes.title: The Curse of Shirley / Courage in the Big Stinkin' City

episodes.synopsis: A burglar breaks into the farmhouse and mistakes the family for his own relatives. / Courage must keep the family safe from the hostile Banana People.
episodes.title: Family Business / One Thousand Years of Courage

episodes.synopsis: Muriel and the farmer are attacked by a mummy. / The government kidnaps Muriel to get her world-famous dog food recipe.
episodes.title: Courage Meets the Mummy / Invisible Muriel

episodes.synopsis: Courage rescues Muriel and the farmer from a sinister vacuum cleaner salesman. / NASA picks Courage and the family to go on a mission.
episodes.title: Human Habitrail / Mission to the Sun

episodes.synopsis: A huge satellite is plummeting towards Earth, and Courage must save the farm. / Katz concocts a mutant jam to kidnap Muriel.
episodes.title: Courage the Fly / Katz Kandy

episodes.synopsis: The biggest lottery in history is about to be announced, but the TV breaks, and the repairman is actually Le Quack. / The computer possesses Muriel.
episodes.title: Nowhere TV / Mega Muriel the Magnificent

episodes.synopsis: Muriel is kidnapped and taken to a Hair Farm to be used for growing hair. / Courage saves Muriel from becoming a human sacrifice.
episodes.title: Bad Hair Day / Forbidden Hat of Gold

episodes.synopsis: When the family goes on a sea cruise, they're forced to help hunt an evil sea serpent. / Courage unearths a bone from a giant kangaroo.
episodes.title: Serpent of Evil River / The Transplant

episodes.synopsis: On a mission to collect human qualities, a floating alien brain extracts Muriel's kindness. / Courage dreams of being a brave Western lawman.
episodes.title: Car Broke, Phone Yes / Cowboy Courage

episodes.synopsis: When the family runs over a giant weevil, Muriel invites the bug home to recover from his injuries. / Courage faces a vengeful ghost.
episodes.title: Evil Weevil / McPhearson Phantom

episodes.synopsis: A giant sand whale visits the farm, demanding the return of his accordion. / Courage saves the family when they're swallowed by a giant sand whale.
episodes.title: The House of Discontent / The Sand Whale Strikes

episodes.synopsis: A miserable and sinister scientist who wants everyone else to be miserable, too, unleashes misery on the entire town of Nowhere.
episodes.title: The Tower of Dr. Zalost

episodes.synopsis: A couple come to fix the Bagges' TV, and Muriel and Eustace are unaware they're criminals. / Di Lung builds a mechanical version of Courage.
episodes.title: Muriel Meets Her Match / Courage vs. Mecha-Courage

episodes.synopsis: On a camping trip, Muriel's kidnapped by two orphaned raccoons. / When Muriel gets trapped in a Velvet Vic record, its up to Courage to get her out.
episodes.title: Campsite of Terror / Record Deal

episodes.synopsis: A storm goddess mistakes Courage to be her dog and takes him. / The Sandman  takes Muriel's sleeping sand, causing Muriel to have insomnia.
episodes.title: Stormy Weather / The Sandman Sleeps

episodes.synopsis: When the computer gets a virus and traps Muriel inside, Courage must get her out. / Three Valkyries mistake Muriel as their sister and carry her off.
episodes.title: Hard Drive Courage / The Ride of the Valkyries

episodes.synopsis: Eustace's Ma plans to exploit a coral city for her wig factory. / A strange man convinces the Bagges to live in filth, causing a potential biohazard.
episodes.title: Scuba Scuba Doo / Conway the Contaminationist

episodes.synopsis: Muriel and Courage go on a submarine run by an old enemy. / A strange pink curtain is going through Nowhere making the citizens cruel and mean.
episodes.title: Katz Under the Sea / Curtain of Cruelty

episodes.synopsis: Bullfrogs whose pond dried up start to invade the Bagges' house for water. / Muriel gets swallowed by a giant space worm and Courage must rescue her.
episodes.title: Feast of the Bullfrogs / Tulip's Worm

episodes.synopsis: The Bagges get trapped in the Louvre, and the paintings come to life. / Muriel helps a scarecrow become scarier so he can frighten away bad people.
episodes.title: So In Louvre Are We Two / Night of the Scarecrow

episodes.synopsis: Nasty magician Mondo traps Eustace in the TV and makes Muriel his bride. / Muriel's abducted by a giant mother bird and must look after its babies.
episodes.title: Mondo Magic / Watch the Birdies

episodes.synopsis: The fish court forces the Bagges to live in a fish bowl with gills. / Zombie director Benton Tarantella wants the Bagges to star in his latest sitcom.
episodes.title: Fishy Business / Angry Nasty People

episodes.synopsis: The Bagges plant fruits and vegetables that are carnivorous and attempt to eat the family. / The Snowman freezes the Bagges's farm in revenge.
episodes.title: Dome of Doom / Snowman's Revenge

episodes.synopsis: Muriel and Courage meet mysterious conjoined twin sisters at a quilt shop. / Eustace rips off shop owner Shirley, who casts a spell on him and Muriel.
episodes.title: The Quilt Club / Swindlin' Wind

episodes.synopsis: The King of Flan uses TV to hypnotize citizens so they eat as much flan as possible. / Island natives plan to sacrifice Muriel to their Volcano God.
episodes.title: King of Flan / Courage Under the Volcano

episodes.synopsis: When the local river floods Nowhere, Courage must locate the source of the disaster. / Two man-eating rats want to feast on Muriel and Eustace.
episodes.title: A Beaver's Tale / The Nutcracker

episodes.synopsis: Muriel's imprisoned by her Scottish uncle and forced to make kilts. / A lonely scientist wants neighbors, so he makes the Bagge farmhouse come to him.
episodes.title: Rumpledkiltskin / Housecalls

episodes.synopsis: Le Quack has ulterior motives when he takes Muriel on a trip to Sweden. / If the Bagge windmill stops turning, the ghosts of dead vandals will attack.
episodes.title: Le Quack Balloon / Windmill Vandals

episodes.synopsis: Muriel seeks a cure for her unusual cold among some swamp-slugs enslaved by a snake. / Eustace tries to prove to his dead brother that he can hunt.
episodes.title: The Uncommon Cold / Farmer-Hunter, Farmer-Hunted

episodes.synopsis: The Swamp Monster finds Muriel's pendant and thinks she's his long-lost bride. / An injured Muriel travels to a hot spring guarded by an angry goat.
episodes.title: Bride of Swamp Monster / Goat Pain

episodes.synopsis: A missile strike mutates a carrot in the garden. Muriel eats it and begins to grow. / The Bagges have their silhouettes drawn, and they come to life.
episodes.title: Muriel Blows Up / Profiles in Courage

episodes.synopsis: In a special two-part episode, Kitty, a dog-hating stranger wearing a mask, shows up at the farm. It's special. And it's two-parts. So there.
episodes.title: The Mask

episodes.synopsis: A Chinese empress wants to grind up Muriel's bones. / Muriel has had enough of Eustace not listening to her, and she decides not to talk to him again.
episodes.title: Squatting Tiger, Hidden Dog / Muted Muriel

episodes.synopsis: When an angry dragon arrives at The Farm to satisfy his taste for humans, Courage bravely cuts a deal with him. Well as bravely as Courage can.
episodes.title: Aqua Farmer / Food of the Dragon

episodes.synopsis: Courage must save a space squid and her eggs to keep the heavens twinkling. / The three-headed son of Courage's first nemesis is out for revenge.
episodes.title: The Last of the Starmakers / Son of the Chicken from Outer Space

episodes.synopsis: Multi-limbed aliens come to Earth seeking a cure for a strange virus. / Eustace invites some odd characters to destroy Courage in a dodgeball game.
episodes.title: Courageous Cure/ Ball of Revenge

episodes.synopsis: While digging in the yard, Courage finds a library book that is two years overdue! Also the Family travels to Hollywood. So there's that.
episodes.title: Cabaret Courage / Wrath of the Librarian

episodes.synopsis: Courage's mysterious past comes to light: His parents were sent to space by a veterinarian. / Courage learns that there is no such thing as perfect.
episodes.title: Remembrance of Courage Past / Perfect
